001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.hilt;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import dagger.Module;
006import dagger.Provides;
007import dagger.hilt.InstallIn;
008import dagger.hilt.android.components.FragmentComponent;
009import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ActivityContext;
010import dagger.hilt.android.scopes.FragmentScoped;
011
012@Module
013@InstallIn(FragmentComponent.class)
014public class LayoutInflaterModule {
015
016  @Provides
017  @FragmentScoped
018  LayoutInflater provideLayoutInflater(@ActivityContext Context context) {
019    return LayoutInflater.from(context);
020  }
021
022}
